summary: A fan club of die-hard James Dean fans meet on the 20th anniversary of his death and reconnect, opening old wounds and facing new ones.
cast: Sandy Dennis|Cher|Karen Black|Sudie Bond|Kathy Bates|Marta Heflin|Mark Patton|Caroline Aaron|Ruth Miller|Gena Ramsel|Ann Risley|Dianne Travis
title: Vuelve a la tienda de baratijas, Jimmy Dean
